archimate:BusinessProcess.name: ACQ.13.BP11 Identify risks
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Identify risks associated with project life cycle and with suppliers. NOTE 5: Potential risk areas are for example stakeholder (customer, user, and sponsor), product (uncertainty, complexity), processes (acquisition, management, support, and organization), resources (human, financial, time, infrastructure), context (corporate context, project context, regulatory context, location) or supplier (process maturity, resources, experience).
